querys.query: SELECT vc.*, m.name as block_member_name FROM v_customer vc LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON vc.block_member_id = m.id WHERE vc.company_id = :companyId AND vc.is_block = 1 AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'name' THEN vc.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'telNumber' THEN vc.tel_number LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'blockType' THEN vc.block_type LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'remark' THEN vc.remark LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'blockMemberName' THEN m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'all' THEN vc.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR vc.tel_number LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR vc.block_type LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR vc.remark LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) ORDER BY vc.create_date DESC LIMIT :limit, :pageSize

SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCount FROM v_customer vc LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON vc.block_member_id = m.id WHERE vc.company_id = :companyId AND vc.is_block = 1 AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'name' THEN vc.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'telNumber' THEN vc.tel_number LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'blockType' THEN vc.block_type LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'remark' THEN vc.remark LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'blockMemberName' THEN m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN :searchType = 'all' THEN vc.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR vc.tel_number LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR vc.block_type LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR vc.remark LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') OR m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', :searchValue, '%') ELSE 1 = 1 END )
UPDATE customer_company SET swear_count = :swearCount, insult_count = :insultCount, update_member_id = :loginId WHERE company_id = :companyId AND customer_id = :id

UPDATE customer_company SET block_member_id = :loginId, block_date = NOW(), block_type = :blockType, remark = :remark, is_block = 1, update_member_id = :loginId WHERE company_id = :companyId AND customer_id = :id
UPDATE customer_company SET block_member_id = NULL, block_date = NULL, block_type = NULL, is_block = 0, update_member_id = :loginId WHERE company_id = :companyId AND customer_id = :id
UPDATE customer_company SET swear_count = swear_count + 1, update_member_id = :loginId WHERE company_id = :companyId AND customer_id = :id
UPDATE customer_company SET insult_count = insult_count + 1, update_member_id = :loginId WHERE company_id = :companyId AND customer_id = :id
